modifiedtripleset.mtriple: School of Business and Social Sciences at the Aarhus University | country | Denmark

entry.lex: The School of Business and Social Sciences at the Aarhus University is located in the country of Denmark which has the religion The Church of Denmark.

The School of Business and Social Sciences at the Aarhus University in Denmark is also where the Church of Denmark is located.
C'est également à l'École de commerce et de sciences sociales de l'Université d'Aarhus, au Danemark, que se trouve l'Église du Danemark.
School of Business and Social Sciences at the Aarhus University is in Denmark as well as the Church of Denmark.
L'École de commerce et de sciences sociales de l'Université d'Aarhus se trouve au Danemark, de même que l'Église danoise.
